generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with visible cobblestone texture in the foreground and asphalt further down, where cars are driving.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks on both sides of the road, clearly separated from the road by curbs and bordered by buildings.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, constructed from brick and stone, with windows and architectural details.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street, with some foliage showing in the background.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- traffic sign: A blue directional sign with an arrow pointing right is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- car: Two black cars are parked on the right side of the road, and one black car is driving away in the middle of the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the right sidewalk, leaning against a building.
- pole: A pole with a traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road, near the parked cars.
